The secondary purpose provide initial pharmacokinetic ( PK ) pharmacodynamic ( PD ) profile PRA-027 healthy woman nonchildbearing potential , evaluate effect high-fat meal PK PD PRA-027 administer healthy woman nonchildbearing potential .
DOC.brief_title: Study Safety , Tolerability , PK PRA-027 Administered Women Nonchildbearing Potential
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA Women nonchildbearing potential ( WONCBP ) age 18 60 year . Must negative pregnancy test result within 48 hour administration test article . Women surgically sterile must provide documentation procedure operative report ultrasound scan . Body mass index ( BMI ) range 18.0 30.0 kg/m2 body weight ³50 kg . BMI calculate take subject 's weight , kilogram , divide square subject 's height , meter , screening : BMI=weight ( kg ) / [ height ( ) ] 2 Healthy determine investigator basis screen evaluation . EXCLUSION CRITERIA Any significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gynecologic , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , hematologic , neurologic , psychiatric disease . A history drug abuse within 1 year study day 1 , history alcoholism within 1 year study day 1 consumption 2 standard unit alcohol per day ( standard unit equal 12 ounce beer , 1½ ounce 80proof alcohol , 6 ounce wine ) . Any positive finding urine drug screen amphetamine , barbiturate , benzodiazepine , cannabinoids , cocaine , methadone , opiate . Use investigational prescription drug within 30 day test article administration . Consumption caffeinecontaining product ( eg , coffee , tea , chocolate , soda ) alcoholic beverage within 48 hour study day 1 . Consumption grapefruit grapefruitcontaining product within 72 hour study day 1 . Use overthecounter drug , include herbal supplement ( except occasional use acetaminophen vitamin ≤100 % recommend daily allowance ) within 14 day study day 1 .
